abstract: As Synthes confirms that it is in merger discussions, speculation arises over who in medical devices might be next.
snippet: As Synthes confirms that it is in merger discussions, speculation arises over who in medical devices might be next.
lead_paragraph: Synthes, the Swiss-American medical tools maker, confirmed on Monday that it was in talks with Johnson & Johnson, spurring hopes of a deal and of possibly others to follow.

headline.main: J.&J.-Synthes Talks Spur Hopes for Deals
